es.ubu.alu.controller.network

Class TCPSenderBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ubu.alu.controller.network.TCPSenderBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sender

    public class TCPSenderBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sender
    Implements the functions for each operation available in the remote board.

    The commands are sent inside packets through the network using Transmission Control Protocol (TCP). To achieve this, it is necessary to know the IP address and the port of the board that will receive the package.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    RPC
